original_title: Bizarre Lust of a Sexual Deviant
overview: A prowler is on the loose in the city. He stalks women, chloroforms them, and then molests their unconscious, naked bodies. Only Angie knows the secrets behind the masked intruder. Will Angie stop this deviant from molesting more women? Or will Angie herself become this man's next slumbering victim?
tagline: His strange desires... ripped from today's headlines!
title: Bizarre Lust of a Sexual Deviant
